subagent-driven-development.description: Default implementation workflow with architect review nodes

nodes.prompt_template: Implement this task with TDD discipline: {task}
Review implementation for task '{task}'. Focus on correctness, maintainability, and blockers.
Write a concise implementation plan for: {task}
Verify whether the plan for '{task}' has enough checkpoints and clear verification.
Brainstorm options for: {task}. Keep tradeoffs explicit.
